import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
	
	/*
	 * https://www.codechef.com/problems/CB3
	 */

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Scanner scan = new Scanner(System.in);
		ArrayList<Long> nums = precomp();
		
		int runs = scan.nextInt();
		for (int i = 0; i < runs; i++) {
			int length = scan.nextInt();
			for (int j = 0; j < length; j++) {
				System.out.print(convert(nums.get(j)));
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
		
		scan.close();
	}
	
	private static ArrayList<Long> precomp() {
		ArrayList<Long> nums = new ArrayList<Long>();
		nums.add(1L);
		nums.add(1L);
		for (int i = 2; i <= 90; i++) {
			long newTerm = nums.get(i-1) + nums.get(i-2);
			nums.add(newTerm);
		}
		return nums;
	}
	
	static char convert(long num) {
        if(num > 26){
            num %= 26;
        }
        if (num == 0) num = 26;
        num += 64;
		return (char)num;
	}
}
